Topic.Title: How to make options appear and disappear after doing other options

Posts.EditableText: I want to do something where specific verbs won't show up until you click on another verb option. And after you click on the verb option it disappears.  Ex. you can't use or see the verb "look at" until you use the verb "talk to", but after using "talk to" that option disappears.
Posts.HTML: I want to do something where specific verbs won't show up until you click on another verb option. And after you click on the verb option it disappears. Ex. you can't use or see the verb "look at" until you use the verb "talk to", but after using "talk to" that option disappears.

Posts.EditableText: If it’s just a few options in each case, I set a flag on the first action and use an if script for the second object.
Posts.HTML: If it’s just a few options in each case, I set a flag on the first action and use an if script for the second object.
